๐ 7 โ 9 AM:
โช๏ธ The time for food absorption in the small intestine, so breakfast should be eaten within this time.
โช๏ธ Patients suffering from anemia and low hemoglobin should have breakfast before 6:30 AM ๐ณ.
๐ Breakfast Time: ๐ฅ๐ฝ๏ธ
๐ Those who wish to maintain their physical and mental health should have breakfast before 7:30 AM. Not having breakfast, especially early, is one of the main causes of liver and digestive system disorders.
๐ Having breakfast between 9 โ 10 AM has negative effects on the body and the biological clock. It is better to skip it if you cannot have breakfast before 7:30 AM, and instead, you can have a spoonful of olive oil or coconut oil and a liter of water. ๐ฅ
๐ Results of Biological Clock Disruption:
Bipolar Disorder:
A psychological disorder characterized by changing times of depression and abnormal elation.
Short-term Memory:
If the body's internal clock does not work properly, it results in short-term memory problems and an inability to keep new information.
Weight Gain or Loss:
Not getting enough sleep affects the levels of metabolic hormones that regulate satiety and hunger.
Risk of Diabetes:
Those who sleep less than 6 hours or more than 8 hours at night have an increased risk of diabetes.
